Found linting issues:
line 21: unquotedTemplateValues: templates should be single-quoted:
	name: {{ fromConfigMap "default" "cool-car" "model" }}
line 23: unquotedTemplateValues: templates should be single-quoted:
	unquotedKey: {{ fromConfigMap "default" "cool-car" "model" }}
line 25: unquotedTemplateValues: extra quote after closing template delimiter:
	extraDoubleQuote: '{{ $.ObjectName }}'"
line 26: unquotedTemplateValues: extra quote after closing template delimiter:
	extraSingleQuote: '{{ .metadata.name }}''
line 28: unquotedTemplateValues: templates for array items should be single-quoted:
	- {{ (lookup "v1" "ConfigMap" "policies" "coolest-car").data.model }}
line 30: unquotedTemplateValues: templates should be single-quoted:
	- host: {{ fromConfigMap "default" "cool-car" "model" }}
line 31: mismatchedDelimiters: mismatched hub and managed cluster delimiters:
	- port: '{{hub .ManagedClusterName }}'

failed to parse input to YAML: error converting YAML to JSON: yaml: line 24: did not find expected key
